item.description:
RSVP instructions for Grezzo Restaurant events:

To RSVP, please use both the Meetup system and Call Grezzo at 857.362.7288 and tell them that you are part of the Boston Raw Meetup party. If you only use the Meetup RSVP system, then you won't have a reservation. If you only contact Grezzo and don't use Meetup, your Meetup member stats and our group's Meetup stats won't be correct. Please be courteous and cancel if you cannot attend as they will keep a seat empty waiting for you if you make a reservation. Thank you for understanding.


Sunday Dinner at Grezzo Restaurant in Boston's North End!

Alissa Cohen's new raw vegan restaurant opened in February and the food is excellent. Members loved the March 2nd event. The desserts are worth the trip. Grezzo can seat 32 including 3 at the bar so let's see if we can fill it.

Grezzo Restaurant is "...committed to bringing you flawlessly fresh food with its lifeforce still intact. The concept is green, organic and locally-grown vegan, raw food served in an upscale style and setting." The menu will change daily.

You can learn more at http://www.GrezzoRest...

You can order Alissa's book and/or DVD here
http://www.alissacohe...

-----------
-------------
For Boston Raw Food Meetup posted files, click here:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/files

To promote BRFM, please print, cut & post tear-strip flyer:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetupTear-stripFlyer.pdf

To promote BRFM, please print, cut & hand out these strips of paper:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetup-MemDrive12Up.doc

For upcoming events, please check the calendar:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/calendar

For more information, please check the message board:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/messages/boards

For other raw events around New England
www.RawNewEnglandCommunity.com

Posted by Daryl
item.name: Sunday Dinner at Grezzo Restaurant!
